name: Power Up Pong
description:
Pong with power ups that might have neutral effect (good or bad for both players), good or bad effect for one player. Which for now is local multiplayer.

Features that I like to add:

  • AI;
    • Allow player to choose which side;
  • Allow player to change score limmit; 
  • More power ups;
  • Should I need to add help menu? At least for controls;
  • Maybe other stuff, that for now I can't think of.
